alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Merrimack (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 5:06AM EST until December 21 at 3:24PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...Observed flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Suncook River At North Chichester affecting Belknap and Merrimack Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Suncook River at North Chichester. * WHEN...Until Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Several properties surrounded by floodwaters along Riverside Drive and Bachelder Road with damages likely to items not moved to higher ground. Water up to properties on Jasper Drive in Allenstown. Floodwaters encroach onto low lying properties of Kings Towne Park in Epsom. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 12.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 4:15 AM EST Tuesday was 12.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late Thursday morning and continue falling to 5.9 feet early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
